frontmatter.title: A repository of my undergraduate studies
frontmatter.description: This is a collection of resources, suggestions and  recommendations.  Here I have collected a lot of study material of the courses I have taken as an undergrad. I also share insights and  general recommendations on certain subjects,  specific to the mathematics program of Yachay Tech. This collection is designed to assist fellow students in building a stronger math background.
